sentences.en: A strong love has sprung up between the minstrel and the king.
sentences.cn: 于是吟游诗人与国王之间就产生了深厚的感情.

sentences.en: Alfred the Great acted his own spy, visiting Danish camps disguised as a minstrel.
sentences.cn: 阿尔弗雷德大帝曾亲自充当间谍.他扮作吟游歌手到丹麦军队的营地里侦察.

sentences.en: He fuses ancient and modern instruments of the minstrel and forges a startlingly unique musical language.
sentences.cn: 他将古代和现代的吟游诗人的乐器融合为一体,锻造出令人惊奇的独特的音乐语言.

sentences.en: If some minstrel belts out “Imagine” or gets a crowd to sing along hoping to carry away a hatful of coins, this busker could face a fine ranging from $50 to $200.
sentences.cn: 如果在这片草莓园里，有流浪歌手高歌吟唱他的《想象》或是唱着民谣摇滚，招致大批群众围观，而只是为了能让自己“行乞”的帽子装满硬币的街头艺人们，可能会面临50到200美元不等的罚款。

sentences.en: Minstrel shows included music, dance and comedy.
sentences.cn: 滑稽说唱团演出有音乐 、 舞蹈和喜剧.

sentences.en: No money, on my faith, but the gleek; I will give you the minstrel.
sentences.cn: 我可不给你们钱, 哼!我要给你们一顿骂; 我骂你们是一群卖唱的叫化子.

sentences.en: Stephen Foster wrote almost thirty songs for minstrel shows.
sentences.cn: 史蒂芬?福斯特为滑稽说唱团演出写了将近30首歌.

sentences.en: The end man in a minstrel show.
sentences.cn: 压轴巡游演出中的最后艺人.

sentences.en: The first of all the negro minstrel shows came to town, and made a sensation.
sentences.cn: 一流的黑人演奏队来到了这个小镇, 引起了轰动.

sentences.en: The king and queen always have minstrel play at their feast.
sentences.cn: 国王和王后总是要音乐家在宴会上表演.

sentences.en: The minstrel had been to many places before he came here.
sentences.cn: 在来到这里之前,这个吟游诗人已经去过很多地方.

sentences.en: The minstrel travelled about the country singing songs and poems written by him.
sentences.cn: 这名吟游诗人在全国游历,吟唱他自己写的诗歌.

sentences.en: The Negro minstrel is touring the country.
sentences.cn: 那个黑人歌舞团正在全国各地巡回演出.

sentences.en: The young minstrel had a rare, rich voice.
sentences.cn: 这个青年歌手有一幅稀有的嘹亮嗓音.

sentences.en: This weary minstrel - life that once was girt.
sentences.cn: 这疲乏的行吟生涯也曾想望过.

trans.tran_cn: 歌手，艺人，旅行音乐师，吟游诗人
trans.tran_en: a singer or musician in the Middle Ages
